definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Drying machine of the filter before adding the automatic device should be drainage.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機之前的過濾器應加裝自動排水器。

sentences.english: Use washers and dryers for full loads only.
sentences.chinese: 僅僅在乾重活的時候使用洗衣機和乾燥機。

sentences.english: Airing is under ventilated place, drying machine is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 放在通風處晾乾，不可放入乾燥機中。

sentences.english: We independently developed the drum dryer to mention quality oxygen-free lignite.
sentences.chinese: 我們自主開發研製的滾筒式無氧褐煤提質乾燥機。

sentences.english: Drying machine and the capacity of filter should be consistent with the displacement compressors.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機及過濾器的處理量應與壓縮機的排氣量相一致。

sentences.english: The heater's power supply also needs to be disconnected for micro heat absorption drier.
sentences.chinese: 微熱型吸附式乾燥機同時需關斷加熱器電源。

sentences.english: White dryer entrance temperature exceeds the specified value.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機入口溫度是否超過規定值。

sentences.english: The most common way to make dehydrated vegetables in China now is tunnel drying.
sentences.chinese: 人們普遍使用傳統隧道式乾燥機生產脫水菜。

sentences.english: Chain dryer is a type of drying equipment mostly applied in domestic ceramic factories.
sentences.chinese: 鏈式乾燥機是日用陶瓷生產廠家常用的乾燥設備。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a whirlwind flash drier, which belongs to a high-speed airflow drier.
sentences.chinese: 一種旋風式閃蒸乾燥機，屬於快速氣流乾燥設備。

sentences.english: A kind of airflow dryer in drying and cooling extruded feedstuff is described here.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種氣流乾燥機在膨化飼料上的乾燥和冷卻。

sentences.english: The text describes the trait and work principle of the electric control of far-infrared fruit and vegetable drier .
sentences.chinese: 介紹遠紅外果蔬乾燥機電氣控制的特點及工作原理。

sentences.english: The dryer consists of an enclosed, thermal-jacketed vessel that serves as the drying chamber.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機由一個封閉的腔，熱夾套容器乾燥，可作爲。

sentences.english: This paper deals with a computing method for the design of the commercial rotary driers.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一個計算工業規模的迴轉筒乾燥機的方法。

sentences.english: White dryer placement is appropriate, whether the environment temperature to meet the use requirements.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥機擺置是否適當，環境溫度是否滿足使用要求。

sentences.english: The granules first get into the drying machine.
sentences.chinese: 顆粒首先要進入乾燥機。
